UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Post-secretory events alter the peptide content of the skin secretion of Hypsiboas raniceps.
Literature.Author: Magalhães BS, Melo JA, Leite JR, Silva LP, Prates MV, Vinecky F, Barbosa EA, Verly RM, Mehta A, Nicoli JR, Bemquerer MP, Andrade AC, Bloch C Jr

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>156µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>156µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29313(MIC=>156µM),Xanthomonas axonopodis pv. citri(MIC=>156µM)
